name: Minimal Youtube [Dark Red]
description: Helps minimize the margins and padding of the website, removing a bit of 'borders' and
css: @-moz-document domain("www.youtube.com") { .yt-lockup-grid .yt-lockup-thumbnail { margin-bottom: 1px; } #channels-browse-content-grid.grid-lockups-container { padding-top: 5px; } .comment-simplebox-arrow .arrow-inner, .comment-simplebox-arrow .arrow-outer { display: none; } .yt-subscription-button-subscriber-count-branded-horizontal.yt-uix-tooltip, .yt-subscription-button-subscriber-count-unbranded-horizontal.yt-uix-tooltip { display: inline; } .yt-lockup-grid .yt-lockup-badges { text-align: right; margin-top: -15px; } .channels-browse-content-grid .channels-content-item { margin-bottom: 1px; } .branded-page-v2-subnav-container { border-bottom: 0px; } .yt-uix-button-subscribed-branded, .yt-uix-button-subscribed-branded[disabled], .yt-uix-button-subscribed-branded[disabled]:hover, .yt-uix-button-subscribed-branded[disabled]:active, .yt-uix-button-subscribed-branded[disabled]:focus, .yt-uix-button-subscribed-unbranded, .yt-uix-button-subscribed-unbranded[disabled], .yt-uix-button-subscribed-unbranded[disabled]:hover, .yt-uix-button-subscribed-unbranded[disabled]:active, .yt-uix-button-subscribed-unbranded[disabled]:focus { background-color: black; color: grey; } .yt-uix-button-subscribe-unbranded, .yt-uix-button-subscribe-unbranded[disabled], .yt-uix-button-subscribe-unbranded[disabled]:hover, .yt-uix-button-subscribe-unbranded[disabled]:active, .yt-uix-button-subscribe-unbranded[disabled]:focus { background-color: #520c09; color: grey; } .yt-uix-button-subscribe-unbranded:hover { background-color: red; } .branded-page-related-channels h3 a, .branded-page-module-title { color: white; } .channel-header .branded-page-header-title .branded-page-header-title-link { color: white; } .lohp-medium-shelves-container { overflow: visible; } .yt-card .yt-uix-button-expander, .comment-simplebox-renderer-collapsed-content { border-top: 0px solid black; } .comment-simplebox-renderer-collapsed-content { border: 1px solid black; } .yt-ui-ellipsis { background: transparent; } #yt-masthead .yt-masthead-logo-container #logo-container { background: #8a3333; border-radius: 5px; } .yt-subscription-button-subscriber-count-branded-horizontal, .yt-subscription-button-subscriber-count-unbranded-horizontal { background: grey; border: 1px solid grey; border-radius: 2px; color: white; } #watch7-sidebar .watch-sidebar-head, #masthead-search-terms input { color: white; } .html5-video-player .video-click-tracking, .html5-video-player .video-stream { width: 100%!important; left: 0px!important; } .gssb_m { background: black; } .watch-stage-mode .player-width { width: 100%; left: 0px; margin-left: 0px; } .yt-uix-button-subscribe-branded { background: #520c09; } .browse-list-item-container:hover .compact-shelf .yt-uix-button-shelf-slider-pager, .compact-shelf:hover .yt-uix-button-shelf-slider-pager { border: 0px; box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); background: grey; } .yt-lockup-title a, .yt-lockup:hover a, .yt-lockup:hover .yt-lockup-meta a, .yt-lockup:hover .yt-lockup-description a { color: white; } a.yt-uix-button-epic-nav-item.selected, a.yt-uix-button-epic-nav-item.yt-uix-button-toggled, button.yt-uix-button-epic-nav-item.selected, button.yt-uix-button-epic-nav-item.yt-uix-button-toggled, .epic-nav-item.selected, .epic-nav-item.yt-uix-button-toggled, .epic-nav-item-heading { color: white; } #yt-masthead-notifications-button { background: #555!important; } #masthead-search .search-btn-component { background: #444; border-radius: 0px; } #movie_player > div.html5-video-container > video { height: 100%; } .yt-uix-button { border: 0px; border-radius: 0px; } .yt-uix-button-default:hover, .yt-uix-button-text:hover { border: 0px; box-shadow: inset 0 0px 0px black; } .branded-page-module-title a { color: white; } #action-panel-details a { color: grey; } .guide-section-separator { border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; } #comment-section-renderer > div.yt-uix-menu.comment-section-sort-menu > button > span.yt-uix-button-content { color: white; } #c4-header-bg-container { border-bottom: 1px solid black; } .yt-uix-button-default:hover, .yt-uix-button-text:hover { background-color: black; } #upload-btn { background: grey; } #yt-masthead-user .sb-notif-on .yt-uix-button-content { border: 0px!important; } #appbar-guide-menu, .guide-flyout { background: black; } .yt-dialog-fg, .yt-uix-overlay-fg { background: black!important; } .yt-uix-menu-trigger-selected .yt-ui-menu-item, .yt-ui-menu-item:hover { background: grey; } #report-form-modal-renderer > div > div > div > div.yt-dialog-fg-content.yt-dialog-show-content > div.yt-dialog-footer > button.yt-uix-button.yt-uix-button-size-default.yt-uix-button-default.yt-dialog-dismiss.yt-dialog-cancel > span, #report-form-modal-renderer > div > div > div > div.yt-dialog-fg-content.yt-dialog-show-content > div.yt-dialog-footer > button.yt-uix-button.yt-uix-button-size-default.yt-uix-button-primary.options-renderer-submit-button.vve-check > span { color: white; } .share-email-preview-container { background: transparent; } #watch7-sidebar .watch-sidebar-separation-line { border-bottom: 1px solid black; } .autoplay-bar .autoplay-info-icon { display: none; } .comment-author-text, .comment-renderer-like-count { color: #8a3333; } div.comment-renderer > div.comment-renderer-content > div.comment-renderer-text > div.comment-text-toggle > div.comment-text-toggle-link.read-more > button > span, div.comment-renderer > div.comment-renderer-content > div.comment-renderer-text > div.comment-text-toggle > div.comment-text-toggle-link.show-less > button > span { color: #8a3333; background: #1b1b1b; border-radius: 5px; padding: 2px 5px 2px 5px; } .yt-uix-button-link { color: #8a3333; } .yt-live-chat-header-renderer-0, .yt-live-chat-renderer-0 { background: #242424; } .yt-live-chat-text-message-renderer-0 #message.yt-live-chat-text-message-renderer { color: #929292; } #watch-sidebar-live-chat, #watch-sidebar-live-chat .yt-uix-expander-collapsed { background: #242424; } .yt-live-chat-message-input-renderer-0 { background-color: hsla(0, 0%, 85%, 0.4); } .yt-live-chat-ticker-renderer-0 { background-color: transparent; } a, #action-panel-details:hover a { color: #8a3333; } #watch7-sidebar .video-list-item a:visited .title, #watch7-sidebar .video-list-item a:visited .title .yt-deemphasized-text, #watch7-sidebar .video-list-item a:hover .title, #watch7-sidebar .video-list-item a:hover .title .yt-deemphasized-text, #watch7-sidebar .video-list-item a:hover:visited .title, #watch7-sidebar .video-list-item a:hover:visited .title .yt-deemphasized-text { color: #a45f5f; } .yt-live-chat-text-message-renderer-0 #menu.yt-live-chat-text-message-renderer { background: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, hsl(0, 59%, 35%) 100%); } .comment-renderer-author-comment-badge.creator { background-color: #a22f2f; } .guide-pinned .guide-pinning-enabled #appbar-guide-menu { border-right: 0px solid black; } #yt-dialog-title-4 { color: white; } #report-form-modal-renderer > div > div > div { border: 0px solid black; } #report-form-modal-renderer > div > div { background: rgba(0, 0, 0, .9); } #masthead-appbar { background-color: black; border-bottom: 0px; } .yt-ui-menu-content { background: black; border: 1px solid grey; } #browse-items-primary .item-section>li>.yt-lockup-tile, .branded-page-v2-primary-col .branded-page-box, .section-list li .item-section .branded-page-box { border-bottom: 3px solid black; } .yt-lockup-title a { color: white; } .comment-renderer-text-content { color: white; } .compact-shelf .yt-uix-button-shelf-slider-pager, .related-list-item .thumb-wrapper a { background: black; } .comment-simplebox-renderer { border-bottom: 1px solid black; } .comment-replies-renderer-paginator { background-color: transparent!important; } .yt-thumb { background: transparent; } body { background: black; } .yt-card, #yt-masthead-container, #masthead-search-terms { background: #242424; } .masthead-search-terms-border { border: 0px; box-shadow: inset 0 0px 0px black; } .yt-uix-button-default { background: grey; border-color: grey; } #yt-masthead-container { border-bottom: 0px; } #yt-masthead-user { border-left: 0px; border-bottom: 0px; } .yt-badge { border: 0px; color: red; } body #footer-container { background: transparent; } #footer-links-primary a { color: white; } body #footer-container { border-top: 0px; } #watch8-action-buttons { border-top: 0px; } hr, html, i, iframe, img, ins, kbd, label, legend, menu, object, ol, p, pre, q, s, samp, small, span, strike, strong, sub { color: white; } li { color: grey; } .video-list .video-list-item .title, .watch-view-count, #watch-header .yt-user-info a { color: white; } }
